creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: boy with dark hair, seen from back, with head turned to PL, running through a deserted night cobblestone street, carrying a candle and wearing a blue cap, nightshirt and slippers
medium: Watercolor and pen and ink on card
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: Wee Willy Winky
